name: Blobulex
description:
blobulex

GMTK 2020 submission. Theme: 'Out of Control'.

My first ever game jam submission!

A fun little experiment using simplex noise to generate a maze-like world of blobs that ebb and flow. Have fun exploring!

I added some silly little sound effects but honestly think this would be best played with some chilled out tunes on in the background!

Programmed over a weekend using the Pico-8 Fantasy Console.

Follow me on Insta @sam_goodridge
